alert.note: Alert for Kivalina and Red Dog Dock (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued November 12 at 5:59PM AKST until November 13 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Kivalina and Red Dog Dock. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall and strongest winds are expected this evening and early tonight with conditions slowly improving into Monday morning.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
